Texts.Eng:
NO, THEY'RE NOT VAMPIRES, JUST A WEIRD GENETICALLY MUTATED HORSE. To be honest though, dark biomes put no scare to those.

Diet: ^green;Herbivore^reset;

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Max Food x^green;1.5^reset;, Health & Energy x^green;1.1^reset;
  Fall Damage x^green;0.5^reset;
  Resist: +^green;50^reset;% Poison, +^green;20^reset;% Shadow
  Immune: Darkness, Poison
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Dark Biomes:
    Damage x^green;1.05^reset;, +^green;10^reset;% Energy Regen, ^green;-5^reset;% Hunger Rate
  Garden, Jungle, Primeval, Forest, Savannah biomes:
    Energy x^green;1.05^reset;, +^green;5^reset; Speed & Jump. +^green;5^reset;% Physical Resist.
  Alien or fleshy Biomes:
    Energy x^red;0.9^reset;, Damage x^red;0.85^reset;, -^red;15^reset;% Energy Regeneration
  Cold or hot biomes:
    Health x^red;0.9^reset;, -^red;13^reset;% speed & jump and -^red;40^reset;% Energy Regeneration.
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Magnorbs: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance
  Thrown: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;
  Dual Daggers: +^green;17.5^reset;% Crit Damage, +^green;6^reset;% Speed
  Dagger: Damage x^green;1.05^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Poor reputation: -^red;10^reset;% Charisma
  Damage x^red;0.85^reset;
  Resist: -^red;20^reset;% Cosmic, -^red;25^reset;% Ice, Electric
